a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: New cases of HIV per 1000 individuals, UNAIDS vs. IHME estimates,
Incidence of HIV, measured as the number of new cases per 1000 individuals of all ages, based on UNAIDS versus IHME,
New cases of HIV per 1000 individuals (IHME)
New cases of HIV per 1000 individuals (UNAIDS) (new cases per 1000)
Data source: Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS (2023); IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
